messages:
Name: Ilkay Gndogan
Nationality: Germany
Date of Birth: October 24, 1990
Position: Midfielder
Current club: Manchester City
Premier League clubs played for: Manchester City
Manchester City midfielder Ilkay Gndogan wasn't involved in any of the three Premier League games that his team have played so far in 2025/2026.
Gndogan last played in the league on May 25, 2025 for Manchester City against Fulham. He found the back of the net in that game for his team in their 2-0 success.
Next up in the league for Manchester City is a home match against Manchester United on September 14.
Gndogan played 33 Premier League games last season for Manchester City, scored one goal and provided six assists.
Gndogan joined Manchester City in August 2024 from Barcelona, for whom he made 36 league appearances in total, scoring five goals and providing nine assists.

Gndogan made a positive impression on his league debut for Manchester City on September 17, 2016. The midfielder netted a goal in his first game in the competition against Bournemouth, aged 25 years and 328 days. In his Premier League career overall, he has played 221 times in the competition, with 45 goals scored and 22 assists.
